translation: Its branches spread below and above, nourished by the Gunas; its buds are sense-objects, and its roots stretch forth below in the world of men, originating action.
commentary: 15.2 Below below? f and? Upwards above? spread spread? His its? Branches: branches? nourished by the Gunas? senseobjects (are) its buds? Down below? f and? The roots the roots? Continuities are stretched forth? Karmanubandhini originating action? Manushyaloke in the world of men.Commentary The countless objects? large and small? which life needs are all products of the five elements
